meanings.definition: A person who operates or works on a boat.
meanings.sent1: The boatman skillfully steered the boat through the calm waters.
meanings.sent2: The boatman helped passengers board the boat safely.
meanings.sent3: The boatman joked that he could navigate blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: The boatman was the captain of the ship, guiding it through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The boatman's expertise made him the most reliable sailor on the crew.

meanings.definition: A man who is skilled in the operation of boats.
meanings.sent1: The experienced boatman knew every detail of the boat's mechanics.
meanings.sent2: The boatman's steady hands controlled the boat effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The boatman's reputation as the best sailor in town spread quickly.
meanings.sent4: The boatman's precision in steering the boat was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The boatman's dedication to his craft earned him respect from all.

meanings.definition: A sailor or seaman who navigates a boat.
meanings.sent1: The boatman guided the vessel safely into the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The boatman's knowledge of the sea helped him avoid dangerous reefs.
meanings.sent3: The boatman sang sea shanties while steering the boat, entertaining the crew.
meanings.sent4: The boatman's determination to reach shore kept the crew motivated.
meanings.sent5: The boatman's experience as a sailor made him invaluable during rough seas.
